text: How are Kass and Joey different in their spending habits?
suggestion: Kass saves her allowance where Joey spends most of his.
To see that her total in the savings account is increasing.

text: What does Joey want instead of saving money?
suggestion: Joey wants to buy a video game, a Dino Rumble game, a poster, a T-shirt, and a STEM camp.

text: How does he budget for what he wants to buy?
suggestion: He thinks of adding up all the money he gets from various sources: 5 dollars a week from Mom & Dad with the bonus of 10 dollars every four weeks which totals the amount to 30 dollars.
